titleStmt.title: The wives excuse, or, Cuckolds make themselves a comedy, as it is acted at the Theatre-Royal by Their Majesties servants / written by Tho. Southern.
titleStmt.author: Southerne, Thomas, 1660-1746.

notesStmt.note: Dedication in verse signed John Dryden.
